actions.text: No 2705 (Jun 2014 - addition. Jun 2017 - amended). PRIMARY NAME: Dmitry Nikolayevich KOZAK. Date of Birth: 1958-11-07. Additional Information: Deputy Prime Minister of the Russian Federation. Responsible for overseeing the integration of the annexed Autonomous Republic of Crimea into the Russian Federation. Deputy Head of the State Commission for the Socio-Economic Development of Crimea and Sevastopol.

actions.text: No longer appears on FDFA, sanctions program transferred to SECO.
actions.title: SANCTIONS HISTORY

details.text: Deputy Prime Minister (Oct 2008 - Apr 2012) (May 2012 - ). Member of the Supervisory Board of Vnesheconombank (SOE) (2007- ). Chairman of the Supervisory Board of Olimpstroy (SOE) (Nov 2007 - Mar 2012). Minister of Regional Development (Sep 2007 - Oct 2008). Presidential Envoy in the Southern Federal District (Sep 2004 - Sep 2007). Chief of Staff of the Government - Minister of the Russian Federation (1999-2000) (Mar 2004 - Sep 2004). First Deputy Head of the Presidential Administration (Oct 2003 - Mar 2004). Deputy Head of the Presidential Administration (Jun 2000 - Oct 2003).
details.title: BIOGRAPHY

sources.name: PEP - National Government

category.description: This gives details of high-ranking government officials in over 200 countries. Although there may be no reason why you should not do business with these individuals, the Basle Committee on Banking supervision has stated that one should check these customers because without this due diligence, banks can become subject to reputational, operational, legal and concentration risks, which can result in significant financial cost.
category.name: PEP
